data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nieto Nafria, Juan M., Blackman, Roger L., Martin, Jon H. (2014): Two more new species of Aphidura (Hemiptera, Aphididae), and a note on variation in Aphidura bozhkoae Narzikulov. ZooKeys 425: 113-130, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.425.7797, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.425.7797
